ReportComparer.SaveChangesInReports: Do you want to save changes in reports?
ReportComparer.StiReportPropertiesCompareLong: In the report '{0}' the '{1}' property does not correspond to the value of the '{3}' property of the report '{2}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportPropertiesCompareComment: Shows various values of report properties.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentComponentsCompareLong: The component '{0}' not present in the report '{1}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentComponentsCompareComme: Shows what component present in one report only.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentComponentsCompareMessa: There is no component '{1}' for the Container property of the StiClone '{0}'.
There is no component '{1}' for the Master Component property of the StiDataBand '{0}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentVariableCompareLong: The variable '{0}' not present in the report '{1}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentVariableCompareComment: Shows what variable present in one report only.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentDataSourceCompareLong: The data source '{0}' not present in the report '{1}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentDataSourceCompareComme: Shows what data source present in one report only.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentDataRelationCompareLon: The relation '{0}' between '{1}' and '{2}' is not present in the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentDataRelationCompareCom: Shows what relation between the data sources is only in one report.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentBusinessObjectCompareL: The Business Object '{0}' not present in the report '{1}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentBusinessObjectCompareC: Shows what Business Object present in one report only.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentStyleCompareLong: The style '{0}' is not present in the report '{1}'.
ReportComparer.StiReportDifferentStyleCompareComment: Shows what style present in one report only.
ReportComparer.StiComponentPropertiesCompareLong: The '{2}' property of the component '{1}' in the report '{0}' differs from the value of the '{5}' property of the component '{4}' in the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiComponentPropertiesCompareComment: Shows different properties values of identical components.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectPropertiesCompareShort: Different properties values of Business Objects.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectPropertiesCompareLong: In the report '{0}' the '{2}' property of the Business Object '{1}' differs from the values of the '{5}' property of the Business Object '{4}' of the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectPropertiesCompareCommen: Shows different properties values of identical Business Objects.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectDifferentColumnCompareS: No column in the business object.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectDifferentColumnCompareL: The column '{0}' of the Business Object '{1}' of the report '{2}' not present in the Business Object '{3}' of the report '{4}'.
ReportComparer.StiBusinessObjectDifferentColumnCompareC: Shows what columns of identical Business Objects are only in one report.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourceDifferentColumnCompareShort: No column in the data source.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourceDifferentColumnCompareLong: The column '{0}' from the data source '{1}' of the report '{2}' not present in the data source '{3}' of the report '{4}'.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourceDifferentColumnCompareComme: Shows what columns of identical data sources are only in one report.
ReportComparer.StiDataRelationPropertiesCompareLong: The '{2}' property of the relation '{1}' of the report '{0}' differs from the value of the '{5}' property of the relation '{4}' of the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiDataRelationPropertiesCompareComment: Shows different properties values of identical relations.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourcePropertiesCompareShort: Different values of the data sources properties.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourcePropertiesCompareLong: The '{2}' property of the data source '{1}' of the report '{0}' differs from the value of the '{5}' property of the data source '{4}' of the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiDataSourcePropertiesCompareComment: Shows different properties values of identical data sources.
ReportComparer.StiVariablePropertiesCompareLong: The '{2}' property of the variable '{1}' of the report '{0}' differs from the value of the '{5}' property of the variable '{4}' of the report '{3}'.
ReportComparer.StiVariablePropertiesCompareComment: Shows different values of the properties of identical variables.
ReportComparer.StiStylePropertiesCompareShort: Different values of properties in the styles.
ReportComparer.StiStylePropertiesCompareLong: The '{2}' property of the style '{1}' of the report '{0}' differs from the value of the '{5}' property of the style '{4}' of the report '{3 }'.
ReportComparer.StiStylePropertiesCompareComment: Shows different properties values with identical styles.
ReportComparer.StiDeleteVariableActionDescription: Delete the variable from the Report
ReportComparer.StiDeleteDataRelationActionDescription: Delete the relation between data sources
ReportComparer.StiDeleteComponentActionDescription: Delete the component from the report
ReportComparer.StiDeleteDataColumnActionDescription: Delete the column from the data source
ReportComparer.StiCopyDataColumnActionDescription: Copy the column to the data source
ReportComparer.StiDeleteBusinessDataColumnActionsDescri: Delete the column from Business Objects
ReportComparer.StiCopyBusinessDataColumnActionsDescript: Copy the column to the Business Object

CheckActions.SetGrowToHeightToTrue: Set the GrowToHeight property to true
CheckActions.SetGrowToHeightToFalse: Set the GrowToHeight property to false
CheckActions.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV1ActionLong: Disable properties of the '{0}' component which are not supported in the EngineV2.
CheckActions.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV2ActionLong: Disable properties of the component which are not supported in the EngineV1.
CheckActions.StiVerySmallSizesOfComponentsLong: The size of a component will be increased to the GridSize value of a report. This operation does not guarantee the 100% correct fix!
CheckActions.StiMinRowsInColumnsActionLong: Set the MinRowsInColumns property to zero.
CheckActions.StiComponentStyleIsNotFoundOnComponentAc: The value of the ComponentStyle property will be cleared.
CheckActions.StiCanGrowGrowToHeightComponentInContain: The GrowToHeight property will be set to true for all components in container. This operation does not guarantee the 100% correct fix!
CheckActions.StiLargeHeightAtPageActionLong: For handy viewing and editing components, the LargeHeight property of the page will be set to true.
CheckActions.StiPrintHeadersFootersFromPreviousPageLo: Set the PrintHeadersFootersFromPreviousPage property of a page to false.
CheckActions.StiResetPageNumberActionLong: Set the ResetPageNumber property of a page to false.
CheckActions.StiPrintOnPreviousPageLong: Set the PrintOnPreviousPage property of a page to false.
CheckActions.ApplyEngineV2Long: Set the EngineVersion property of a page to EngineV2 to get access to all reporting tool features.
CheckActions.StiAllowOnDoublePassActionLong: Set the NumberOfPass property to DoublePass for correct calculation of variables.
CheckActions.StiNegativeSizesOfComponentsActionLong: Fix the size of the component to eliminate problems when rendering a report. This operation does not guarantee the 100% correct fix!
CheckActions.StiColumnsWidthGreaterContainerWidthActi: Automatically change the column width depending on the width of the components.
CheckActions.StiCanBreakComponentInContainerActionLon: Set the value of the CanBreak property of the component to true.
CheckActions.StiCanGrowWordWrapTextAndWysiwygActionLo: Set the value of the TextQuality property of the component to WYSIWYG.
CheckActions.StiCanGrowComponentInContainerActionLong: Set the value of the CanGrow property of the container to true.
CheckActions.StiGrowToHeightOverlappingLong: Set the value of the GrowToHeight property of the component to false.
CheckActions.StiWordWrapCanGrowTextDoesNotFitActionLo: Set the value of the CanGrow property of the component to true.
CheckActions.StiAllowHtmlTagsInTextActionLong: Set the value of the AllowHtmlTags property of the component to true, for correct showing the HTML tags.
CheckActions.StiFixCrossLinePrimitiveActionLong: Create new points instead of the lost ones. This operation does not guarantee the 100% correct fix!
CheckActions.StiDeleteLostPointsActionLong: Delete all lost points on a page
CheckActions.StiMoveComponentToPageAreaActionLong: The component will be placed so that it is entirely placed on the page. In this case the page fields are not taken into consideration.
CheckActions.StiMoveComponentToPrintablePageAreaActio: Move the component to the page printing area. Page margins will be taken into consideration.
CheckActions.StiSwitchWidthAndHeightOfPageActionLong: Rearrange the height and width of the page.
CheckActions.StiOrientationPageToLandscapeActionLong: Switch the page to the landscape. Page size will not be changed.
CheckActions.StiOrientationPageToPortraitActionLong: Change the page layout to portrait. Page size will not be changed.
CheckActions.StiGenerateNewNameComponentActionLong: Generate a new name for the component.
CheckActions.StiGenerateNewNamePageActionLong: Generate a new name for the page.
CheckActions.StiGenerateNewNameRelationActionLong: Generate a new name for the relation.
CheckActions.StiGenerateNewNameDataSourceActionLong: Generate a new name for the DataSource.
CheckActions.StiDeleteComponentActionLong: Delete the component from the report.
CheckActions.StiDeletePageActionLong: Delete the page from the report.
CheckActions.StiDeleteDataRelationActionLong: Delete the relation from the report.
CheckActions.StiDeleteConnectionActionLong: Delete the connection from the report.
CheckActions.StiDeleteDataSourceActionLong: Delete the DataSource from the report.

CheckReport.StiCompilationErrorCheckLong: The error of compilation is found in the '{0}' report:
CheckReport.StiDuplicatedNameInSourceInDataRelationR: The '{0}' relations are found in the report. They have equal ('{1}') values in the NameInSource. All values in the NameInSource should be unique in the range of one relation to one database! It is necessary to correct these fields of relations.
CheckReport.StiCompilationErrorAssemblyCheckLong: Could not load file or assembly '{0}' or one of its dependencies.

CheckDataSource.StiUndefinedDataSourceCheckLong: The undefined '{0}' datasource is found in the report. The reporting tool cannot correctly process such type of the datasource! Maybe custom datasources are used in the report. This report cannot be rendered!
CheckDataSource.StiNoNameDataSourceCheckShort: There is no name for the DataSource
CheckDataSource.StiNoNameDataSourceCheckLong: The datasource name is not specified. This name is used for creating a class in the report code of the datasource. Without indicating the name, the reporting tool cannot create the report code and the report will not be compiled!
CheckDataSource.StiNoNameInSourceDataSourceCheckShort: NameInSource of the datasource field is not filled
CheckDataSource.StiNoNameInSourceDataSourceCheckLong: NameInSource field is not filled for the '{0}' data sources. Without filling this field, the reporting tool will not be able to find the data for the data source in the database and the report will not be rendered!

CheckDataRelation.StiKeysNotFoundRelationCheckShort: The key of the relation not found
CheckDataRelation.StiKeysNotFoundRelationCheckLong: The following columns: '{1}' which were specified as keys of the '{0}', were not found in the Parent or Child data sources of the relation. This relation cannot be created when report rendering!
CheckDataRelation.StiKeysTypesMismatchDataRelationCheckSho: The key types of the relation does not correspond
CheckDataRelation.StiKeysTypesMismatchDataRelationCheckLon: '{1}' column types which were specified as keys for the '{0}' relation does not correspond! Such a relation cannot be created when report rendering!
CheckDataRelation.StiNoNameDataRelationCheckShort: There is no name for the relation
CheckDataRelation.StiNoNameDataRelationCheckLong: The Name of the relation (created between data sources '{0}') is not specified. This name is used for creating the class in the report code of this relation. Without the name the reporting tool will not be able to create the report code of the report and the report will not be compiled!
CheckDataRelation.StiNoNameInSourceDataRelationCheckShort: NameInSource field is not filled for the relation
CheckDataRelation.StiNoNameInSourceDataRelationCheckLong: NameInSource field is not filled for the '{0}' relation. Without this field the reporting tool will not be able to find the relation in the database and the report will not be rendered!
CheckDataRelation.StiDifferentAmountOfKeysInDataRelationCh: The number of parent keys of the '{0}' relation does not correspond to the number of child keys. The following relation cannot be created when rendering a report!
CheckDataRelation.StiKeysInAbsentDataRelationCheckLong: Keys of the '{0}' relation are not specified. Such a relation will not be created when report rendering!
CheckDataRelation.StiSourcesInAbsentDataRelationCheckLong: The parent data source and/or the child data source is not specified for the '{0}' relation. It is necessary to specify both data sources!

CheckConnection.StiUndefinedConnectionCheckLong: Undefined '{0}' connection is found. The reporting tool cannot correctly process such type of connection with the database! May be the customer types of connections are used in the report. This report cannot be rendered!

CheckPage.StiLostPointsOnPageCheckLong: Lost points are found on the '{0}' page: {1}. Points are invisible and used in the following primitives: vertical line, rectangle and rounded rectangle. If the point does not match to any components then it can be deleted.
CheckPage.StiOrientationPageCheckLongPortrait: The '{0}' page orientation does not correspond to the specified page size. Usually, for Portrait orientation, the page width should be less than the page height. The width of this page is greater than the height. This may cause to problems when printing this page.
CheckPage.StiOrientationPageCheckLongLandscape: The '{0}' page orientation does not correspond to the specified page size. Usually, for Landscape orientation, the page width should be greater than the page height. The width of this page is lesser than the height. This may cause to problems when printing this page.

CheckComponent.StiShowInsteadNullValuesCheckLong: The NullValues property is set for the '{0}' component. But the DataColumn property is not set. This is senseless.
CheckComponent.StiBigSizeOfTheImageAtWatermarkCheckLong: The size of the Watermark of the '{0}' page is too big. The advice is to store the image in resources or to use the vector graphics.
CheckComponent.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV1CheckShort: Some properties are set which are not supported in the EngineV2
CheckComponent.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV1CheckLong: The StartNewPage property of the '{0}' component is supported in the EngineV1 only.
CheckComponent.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV2CheckShort: Some properties are set which are not supported in the EngineV1
CheckComponent.StiPropertiesOnlyEngineV2CheckLong: One of the following properties is used for the '{0}' component: NewPageBefore, NewPageAfter, NewColumnBefore, NewColumnAfter, SkipFirst. They are not supported by EngineV2.
CheckComponent.StiVerySmallSizesOfComponentsCheckShort: Very small size of the component
CheckComponent.StiVerySmallSizesOfComponentsCheckLong: The values of the Width of Height of the '{0}' component are less than the values of the GridSize of the report. Maybe you incorrectly set its size. This may cause problems when exporting to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiDataSourcesForImageCheckLong: Several datasources are set for the '{0}' component.
CheckComponent.StiMinRowsInColumnsCheckLong: The MinRowsInColumns property of the band is not set to 0. But the value of the Columns property is set to 0. This is senseless.
CheckComponent.StiComponentStyleIsNotFoundCheckShort: The specified style does not exist
CheckComponent.StiComponentStyleIsNotFoundCheckLong: The style specified for the '{0}' component does not exist.
CheckComponent.StiComponentStyleIsNotFoundCheckAtPageLo: The style specified for the '{0}' page does not exist.
CheckComponent.StiFontMissingCheckLong: The font '{0}' specified for the component '{1}' is not found.
CheckComponent.StiGroupHeaderNotEqualToGroupFooterShort: Some components will not be rendered
CheckComponent.StiGroupHeaderNotEqualToGroupFooterOnPag: The number of GroupFooter does not correspond to the number of GroupHeader on the '{0}' page. Odd components will not be rendered.
CheckComponent.StiGroupHeaderNotEqualToGroupFooterOnCon: The number of GroupFooter does not correspond to the number of GroupHeader in the '{0}' container. Odd components will not be rendered.
CheckComponent.StiCrossGroupHeaderNotEqualToCrossGroupF: The number of CrossGroupFooter does not correspond to the number of CrossGroupHeader on the '{0}' page. Odd components will not be rendered.
CheckComponent.StiCrossGroupHeaderNotEqualToGroupCrossF: The number of CrossGroupFooter does not correspond to the number of CrossGroupHeader in the '{0}' container. Odd components will not be rendered.
CheckComponent.StiCountDataDataSourceAtDataBandShort: May be you forgot to set values of properties
CheckComponent.StiCountDataDataSourceAtDataBandLong: The CountData, DataSource and BusinessObject properties are not set for the '{0}' components. In some cases it is acceptable.
CheckComponent.StiCanGrowGrowToHeightComponentInContain: It is possible an incorrect showing of components

The CanGrow properties of some components of the '{0}' container are set to true. But the GrowToHeight property is not set to true for all components. When rendering a report these components may be aligned with the bottom margin of the container.
CheckComponent.StiGrowToHeightOverlappingShort: It is possible to overlap components.
CheckComponent.StiGrowToHeightOverlappingLong: The GrowToHeight property of the '{0}' component is set to true. When rendering a report, this component can overlap one or more underlying components.
CheckComponent.StiLargeHeightAtPageCheckShort: Lack of free space on the page
CheckComponent.StiLargeHeightAtPageCheckLong: Lack of free space on the '{0}' page. This may impede further editing the components and preview. It is recommended to set the LargeHeight property to true.
CheckComponent.StiPrintHeadersAndFootersFromPreviousPag: May be the PrintHeadersAndFootersFromPreviousPage property is set incorrectly
The PrintHeadersAndFootersFromPreviousPage property of the '{0}' page is set to true. But for the first and the only page it has no sense.
CheckComponent.StiResetPageNumberCheckShort: Maybe the ResetPageNumber property is set incorrectly
CheckComponent.StiResetPageNumberCheckLong: The ResetPageNumber property of the '{0}' page is set to true. But for the first and the only page it has no sense.
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnPreviousPageCheckShort: Maybe the PrintOnPreviousPage property is set incorrectly
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnPreviousPageCheckLong: The PrintOnPreviousPage property of the '{0}' page is set to true. But for the first and the only page it has no sense.
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnPreviousPageCheck2Short: Some components may not be printed.
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnPreviousPageCheck2Long: The PrintOnPreviousPage property of the '{0}' page is set to true. All components (except bands), which lie on this page will be printed only from the next new page, or may not be printed at all if there will be no new pages.
CheckComponent.StiFunctionsOnlyForEngineV2CheckShort: Variables unavailable in the EngineV1 are used.
CheckComponent.StiFunctionsOnlyForEngineV2CheckLong: System variables which are not available in the EngineV1 are used in the report. Do you want to use EngineV2.
CheckComponent.StiIsFirstPassIsSecondPassCheckShort: IsFirstPass, IsSecondPass functions require double pass when rendering a report
CheckComponent.StiIsFirstPassIsSecondPassCheckLong: For correct work of IsFirstPass, IsSecondPass functions double pass of the report rendering is required. maybe you forgot to set the NumberOfPass property of the report to DoublePass.
CheckComponent.StiIsFirstPageIsLastPageDoublePassCheckS: System variables which require double pass are used in the report
CheckComponent.StiIsFirstPageIsLastPageDoublePassCheckL: The IsFirstPage, IsFirstPageThrough, IsLastPage, IsLastPageThrough system variables provide incorrect results when one pass. It is required to set the NumberOfPass property to DoublePass.
CheckComponent.StiTotalPageCountDoublePassCheckLong: The TotalPageCount, TotalPageCountThrough system variables in scripts and conditions provide incorrect results when one pass. It is required to set the NumberOfPass property to DoublePass.
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnDoublePassCheckShort: The PrintOn property is not set to AllPages
CheckComponent.StiPrintOnDoublePassCheckLong: The PrintOn property of the '{0}' component is not set to AllPages. For correct report rendering double pass should be enabled.
CheckComponent.StiTextColorEqualToBackColorCheckShort: The TextBrush property is equal to the Brush property
CheckComponent.StiTextColorEqualToBackColorCheckLong: Possible reason is that the values of the TextBrush and Brush properties of the '{0}' component were set incorrectly. The text will not be visible.
CheckComponent.StiNegativeSizesOfComponentsCheckShort: The Width and Height of the component have negative values.
CheckComponent.StiNegativeSizesOfComponentsCheckLong: The Width and Height of the '{0}' component have negative values. This may cause to incorrect report rendering.
CheckComponent.StiSubReportPageZeroCheckShort: The SubReportPage property is not set
CheckComponent.StiSubReportPageZeroCheckLong: If the SubReportPage property of the SubReport component is not set then the report cannot be rendered.
CheckComponent.StiColumnsWidthGreaterContainerWidthChec: The total column width is greater then the component width
The total column width is greater then the width of the '{0}' component. This may cause to incorrect report rendering. Also it may cause some problems with exporting a report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiColumnsWidthGreaterPageWidthCheckShor: The total column width is greater than page width
CheckComponent.StiColumnsWidthGreaterPageWidthCheckLong: The total width of columns of the '{0}' page is greater than the page width. This may cause to incorrect report rendering. Also it may cause some problems with exporting a report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiNoConditionAtGroupCheckShort: A condition for the group is not set
CheckComponent.StiNoConditionAtGroupCheckLong: A condition is not set for the '{0}' component. Grouping will not be done without it
CheckComponent.StiCanBreakComponentInContainerCheckShor: The CanBreak property of the container is set to false
CheckComponent.StiCanBreakComponentInContainerCheckLong: The CanBreak property of the '{0}' container is set to false. Some nested components have the CanBreak property set to true.
CheckComponent.StiCanGrowWordWrapTextAndWysiwygCheckSho: Possibly there will be the incorrect text wrap
CheckComponent.StiCanGrowWordWrapTextAndWysiwygCheckLon: When the TextQuality property is set to Standard or Typographic. Text preview, in different zoom modes and when printing may differ due to errors of rounding of the GDI+ library.
CheckComponent.StiCanGrowComponentInContainerCheckShort: The CanGrow property of the container is set to false
CheckComponent.StiCanGrowComponentInContainerCheckLong: The CanGrow property of the '{0}' component is set to false. Some nested components have the CanGrow property set to true. This may cause to incorrect report rendering.
CheckComponent.StiAllowHtmlTagsInTextCheckShort: The AllowHtmlTags property is not set
CheckComponent.StiAllowHtmlTagsInTextCheckLong: HTML tags are used in the text. But the AllowHtmlTags property is set to false. The content of the {0} component will be printed incorrectly.
CheckComponent.StiBigSizeOfTheImageCheckLong: The size of the '{0}' image is too big. There may be some problems with its serialization. Set the StoreImagesInResources property to true to eliminate the problem.
CheckComponent.StiUndefinedComponentCheckLong: Undefined '{0}' component is found in the report. The reporting tool cannot identify this component. Maybe this is a custom component. The report cannot be rendered!
CheckComponent.StiComponentBoundsAreOutOfBandShort: The component is partially outside the band.
CheckComponent.StiComponentBoundsAreOutOfBandLong: The '{0}' component is completely or partially outside the band. This component will not be printed correctly. But, in some cases, such postion of the component is acceptable. Also it may cause some problems with exporting a report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiContainerInEngineV2CheckLong: The '{0}' container is found in the report where the EngineV2 is used. In the EngineV2 the Panel component is used instead of the Container component. The Panel component has more capabilities in compare with the Container.
CheckComponent.StiSystemTextObsoleteCheckLong: The '{0}' component has the StiSystemText type. The StiSystemText component is obsolete and no longer supported, so it is not recommended to use it.
CheckComponent.StiContourTextObsoleteCheckLong: The '{0}' component has the StiContourText type. The StiContourText component is obsolete and no longer supported, so it is not recommended to use it.
CheckComponent.StiPanelInEngineV1CheckLong: The '{0}' panel is found in the report where the EngineV1 is used. This component is not available in the EngineV1. So the reporting tool attempts to render it as a Container component. But the Panel component has more capabilities in compare with the Container and this may cause the incorrect report rendering.
CheckComponent.StiCorruptedCrossLinePrimitiveCheckLong: Start and end points of the '{0}' primitive are absent. This primitive either will not be shown or will be shown incorrectly.
CheckComponent.StiLocationOutsidePageCheckShort: The component is partially outside of the page
CheckComponent.StiLocationOutsidePageCheckLong: The '{0}' component is partially outside of the page. This component will not be printed correctly. Also it may cause some problems with exporting a report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiLocationOutsidePrintableAreaCheckShor: The component is partially out of the printing area
CheckComponent.StiLocationOutsidePrintableAreaCheckLong: The '{0}' component is partially or completely outside of the printing area. This component will not be printed correctly. But, in some cases, such postion of the component is acceptable. Also it may cause some problems with exporting a report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiNoNameComponentCheckLong: The component has no name. If to specify the name of the component then the report engine will not be able to compile the report.
CheckComponent.StiNoNamePageCheckLong: The name of the page with the '{0}' index is not specified. If the name of the page is not specified then the report engine will not compile the report.
CheckComponent.StiWidthHeightZeroComponentCheckShortWid: The height and width of the '{0}' component are equal to 0
The width of the '{0}' component are equal to 0
CheckComponent.StiWidthHeightZeroComponentCheckShortHei: The height of the '{0}' component are equal to 0
CheckComponent.StiWidthHeightZeroComponentCheckLongWidt: The height and width of the '{0}' component are equal to 0. There may be some problems with showing this component on a page. It also may cause some problems when exporting the report to other formats.
The width of the '{0}' component is zero. There may be some problems with showing this component on a page. It also may cause some problems when exporting the report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiWidthHeightZeroComponentCheckLongHeig: The height of the '{0}' component is zero. This may cause problems with showing this component on a page. It also may cause some problems when exporting the report to other formats.
CheckComponent.StiWordWrapCanGrowTextDoesNotFitLong: If the WordWrap property is set to true, and the CanGrow property is set to false, then the text of the {0} component cannot be shown completely. It is recommended to set the CanGrow property to true.
CheckComponent.StiComponentExpressionCheckLong: Expression in {0} property of '{1}' can't be evaluated!

StiComponent.Name: Component name.
StiComponent.ShiftMode: A value that indicates the shift mode of a component.
StiComponent.PrintOn: A value that indicates on which pages will a component be printed.
StiComponent.CanShrink: A value that indicates that this object can shrink.
StiComponent.CanGrow: A value that indicates that this object can grow.
StiComponent.GrowToHeight: A value that indicates that the height of this component increases/decreases to the bottom of a container.
StiComponent.DockStyle: A type of the component docking.
StiComponent.CellDockStyle: A type of the cell docking.
StiComponent.CellType: A type of the cell content.
StiComponent.FixedWidth: A value which indicates that the cell have fixed width.
StiComponent.Bookmark: An expression to fill the component Bookmark.
StiComponent.ToolTip: An expression to fill the component ToolTip.
StiComponent.Hyperlink: An expression to fill the component Hyperlink.
StiComponent.Tag: An expression to fill the component tag.
StiComponent.Alias: A text that will be shown instead of a component name. If the text is not indicated then the name is shown.
StiComponent.Restrictions: A value that indicates the restrictions of a component.
StiComponent.Locked: A value that indicates that moving is locked.
StiComponent.Linked: A value that indicates that the object snap to the container is turned on.
StiComponent.Enabled: A value that indicates will this component be available or not.
StiComponent.UseParentStyles: A value that indicates that this component must use styles from the parent component.
StiComponent.CanBreak: A value that indicates whether the component can or cannot break its contents on several pages.
StiComponent.Brush: A brush to fill a component.
StiComponent.Printable: A value that indicates whether a component is printable or not.
StiComponent.VertAlignment: The vertical alignment of an object.
StiComponent.Editable: A value that indicates that a component can be edited in the window of viewer.
StiComponent.GetToolTipEvent: Occurs when getting the ToolTip for the component.
StiComponent.GetHyperlinkEvent: Occurs when getting the Hyperlink for the component.
StiComponent.GetTagEvent: Occurs when getting the Tag for a component.
StiComponent.GetBookmarkEvent: Occurs when getting the Bookmark for the component.
StiComponent.GetDrillDownReportEvent: Occurs when it is required to get a report for the Drill-Down operation.
StiComponent.ClickEvent: Occurs when a user clicks the component in the window of the viewer.
StiComponent.DoubleClickEvent: Occurs when a user double clicks the component in the report viewer.
StiComponent.MouseEnterEvent: Occurs when a user enters the mouse into the area of the component in the report viewer.
StiComponent.MouseLeaveEvent: Occurs when a user leaves the mouse out of the area of the component in the report viewer.
StiComponent.DataSource: Data source that is used for getting data.
StiComponent.BusinessObject: Business Object that is used for getting data.
StiComponent.DataRelation: Link that is used for master-detail reports rendering.
StiComponent.Filters: A collection of the data filters.
StiComponent.FilterOn: A value that indicates, that filter is turned on.
StiComponent.Sort: The array of strings that describes rules of sorting.
StiComponent.CountData: The count of rows for virtual data.

StiClone.ScaleHor: A value that indicates that contents of the container will be shrunk or grown.

StiSubReport.UseExternalReport: A value that indicates that this sub-report requires the external report.
StiSubReport.KeepSubReportTogether: A value that indicates that the sub-report must to be kept together with the DataBand on what it is placed.

StiSimpleText.GlobalizedName: A value that is used as a key for the Globalization Manager.
StiSimpleText.LinesOfUnderline: A value that indicates that it is necessary underline lines.
StiSimpleText.HideZeros: A value that indicates that there is no need to show zeroes.
StiSimpleText.ProcessingDuplicates: A value that indicates how the report engine processes duplicated values.
StiSimpleText.MaxNumberOfLines: The maximum number of lines which specify the limit of the height stretch.
StiSimpleText.OnlyText: A value that indicates that the text expression contains a text only.
StiSimpleText.ProcessAtEnd: A value that indicates that a text is processed at the end of the report execution.
StiSimpleText.ProcessAt: A value indicates whether to process a text expression of this component at the end of the page rendering or at the end of the report rendering.
StiSimpleText.GetValueEvent: Occurs when the text is being prepared for rendering.

StiText.AutoWidth: A value that indicates that this object can change width automatically.
StiText.RenderTo: In the property specify the Text component in what the text that is out of the current Text component bound will be continued to be output.
StiText.TextOptions: Options to control of the text showing.
StiText.ExcelValue: An expression that is used to export data to Excel. Only for numeric values.
StiText.GetExcelValueEvent: Occurs when the ExcelValue is calculated.
StiText.Angle: An angle of a text rotation.
StiText.ExportAsImage: A value that indicates how content of a text will be exported as an image or as a text.
StiText.TextQuality: A value that indicates text quality.
StiText.AllowHtmlTags: A value that indicates that this component allows HTML tags in a text.
StiText.ShrinkFontToFit: A value that indicates that this component descreases font size to fit contents of a component.
StiText.ShrinkFontToFitMinimumSize: A value that indicates minimum font size for ShrinkFontToFit operation.

StiPage.ResetPageNumber: Allows resetting page number on this page.
StiPage.ExcelSheet: An expression that is used for generation name of excel sheet.
StiPage.PrintOnPreviousPage: A value that indicates that the page will start to be rendered on the free space of the previous page.
StiPage.PrintHeadersFootersFromPreviousPage: A value that indicates that, on this page, it is necessary to print headers and footers of the previous page.
StiPage.PaperSourceOfFirstPage: The paper source for the first page. Some printers does not support this feature.
StiPage.PaperSourceOfOtherPages: The paper source for the first page. Some printers does not support this feature.
StiPage.NumberOfCopies: A value of number of copies of the current page.
StiPage.UnlimitedBreakable: A value that indicates that, when printing multiple-sheet cross-reports, columns and strings are to be broken.
StiPage.LargeHeight: A value that indicates that this page has large height in the designer.
StiPage.LargeHeightFactor: Large height factor for the LargeHeight property of this page.
StiPage.StopBeforePrint: The page number. When it is reached then stop rendering. If the property is 0 then rendering of the report will be stopped.
StiPage.StretchToPrintArea: A value that indicates that, when printing, a page stretches to print area.
StiPage.TitleBeforeHeader: A value that indicates that it is necessary to put the report title before the page header.
StiPage.UnlimitedHeight: A value that indicates that the page has an unlimited height.
StiPage.UnlimitedWidth: A value that indicates that the page has an unlimited width.
StiPage.PageWidth: The total width of the page.
StiPage.PageHeight: The total height of the page.
StiPage.SegmentPerWidth: The number of segments per width.
StiPage.SegmentPerHeight: The number of segments per height.
StiPage.BeginRenderEvent: Occurs when when a page begins to render.
StiPage.EndRenderEvent: Occurs when a page render ends.
StiPage.ColumnBeginRenderEvent: Occurs when begin rendering a column.
StiPage.GetExcelSheetEvent: Occurs when the ExcelSheet is calculated.

StiBorder.DropShadow: A value that indicates whether drop shadow is shown.
StiBorder.Topmost: A value which indicates that border sides will be drawn on top of all components.

StiAdvancedBorder.LeftSide: A frame of the left side.
StiAdvancedBorder.RightSide: A frame of the right side.
StiAdvancedBorder.TopSide: A frame of the top side.
StiAdvancedBorder.BottomSide: A frame of the bottom side.

StiTextOptions.LineLimit: A value that shows compleleted lines only.
StiTextOptions.Angle: An angle of a text rotation.
StiTextOptions.HotkeyPrefix: A type of drawing hot keys.
StiTextOptions.Trimming: A type to trim the end of a line.

StiGlareBrush.StartColor: The start color for the gradient.
StiGlareBrush.EndColor: The end color for the gradient.
StiGlareBrush.Angle: The angle, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis, of the gradient's orientation line.
StiGlareBrush.Focus: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the center of the gradient (the point where the gradient is composed of only the ending color).
StiGlareBrush.Scale: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies how fast the colors falloff from the focus.

StiGlassBrush.DrawHatch: A value that indicates draw hatch at background or not.

StiGradientBrush.StartColor: The start color for the gradient.
StiGradientBrush.EndColor: The end color for the gradient.
StiGradientBrush.Angle: The angle, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis, of the gradient's orientation line.

StiHatchBrush.BackColor: The color of spaces between the hatch lines drawn by this brush.
StiHatchBrush.ForeColor: The color of hatch lines drawn by this brush.

Font.Name: The face name of this Font.
Font.Bold: A value that indicates whether this Font is bold.
Font.Italic: A value that indicates whether this Font is italic.
Font.Underline: A value that indicates whether this Font is underlined.
Font.Strikeout: A value that indicates whether this Font specifies a horizontal line through the font.

StiWatermark.Enabled: A value that indicates whether the Watermark should be drawn or not.
StiWatermark.ShowImageBehind: A value that indicates whether the Watermark image should be drawn behind or in front of a page.
StiWatermark.ShowBehind: A value that indicates whether Watermark should be drawn behind or in front of page.
StiWatermark.ImageMultipleFactor: A value to multiply by its image size.
StiWatermark.Image: A value of the watermark's image.
StiWatermark.ImageTiling: The watermark's image should be tiled.
StiWatermark.ImageStretch: A value that indicates that this watermark's image will be stretched on the page.
StiWatermark.AspectRatio: A value that indicates that this watermark's image will save its aspect ratio.

StiCheckBox.ExcelValue: An expression that is used to export data to Excel.
StiCheckBox.GetCheckedEvent: Occurs when state is being checked.
StiCheckBox.Checked: An expression that is used to calculate check state.
StiCheckBox.Values: A string that describes true and false values.
StiCheckBox.CheckStyleForTrue: Check style for the true value.
StiCheckBox.CheckStyleForFalse: Check style for the false value.

StiImage.GlobalizedName: A value that is used as a key for the Globalization Manager.
StiImage.ImageURL: The expression to fill a component image URL.
StiImage.ImageData: The expression to fill a component image property.
StiImage.GetImageURLEvent: Occurs when getting image url for the component.
StiImage.GetImageDataEvent: Occurs when getting image for the component.
StiImage.ProcessingDuplicates: A value that indicates how the report engine processes duplicated images.
StiImage.ImageRotation: A value that indicates how to rotate an image before output.
StiImage.File: The path to the file that contains an image.
StiImage.DataColumn: A name of the column that contains an image.

StiRichText.Wysiwyg: A value which indicates that it is necessary to use the Wysiwyg mode of the rendering.
StiRichText.DataColumn: A name of the column that contains the RTF text.
StiRichText.FullConvertExpression: A value that indicates that it is necessary to fully convert the expression to the RTF format. Full convertion of expressions slows down the report rendering.

StiView.Smoothing: The smoothing mode for drawing an image.
StiView.Stretch: A value that indicates that this component will stretch the image till an image will get size equal in its size on a page.
StiView.MultipleFactor: A value to multiply by it an image size.
StiView.AspectRatio: A value that indicates that an image will save its aspect ratio.

StiZipCode.Code: An expression to fill a code of zip code.
StiZipCode.GetZipCodeEvent: Occurs when getting the code of zip code.
StiZipCode.Ratio: A value that indicates width and height ratio.

StiWinControl.Text: The text associated with this control.
StiWinControl.ForeColor: The foreground color of the control.
StiWinControl.Font: The font of the text displayed by the control.
StiWinControl.BackColor: The background color for the control.

StiRectanglePrimitive.TopSide: A property that indicates to draw top side of the rectangle or no.
StiRectanglePrimitive.LeftSide: A property that indicates indicates to draw left side of the rectangle or no.
StiRectanglePrimitive.BottomSide: A property that indicates indicates to draw bottom side of the rectangle or no.
StiRectanglePrimitive.RightSide: A property that indicates indicates to draw right side of the rectangle or no.

StiInteraction.SortingEnabled: A value that indicates whether it is allowed or not, using given component, data re-sorting in the report viewer.
StiInteraction.SortingColumn: A column by what data should be re-sorted in the report viewer.
StiInteraction.DrillDownEnabled: A value that indicates whether the Drill-Down operation can be executed.
StiInteraction.AllowSeries: A value that indicates whether the Drill-Down operation can be executed for Series.
StiInteraction.AllowSeriesElements: A value that indicates whether the Drill-Down operation can be executed for Series Elements.
StiInteraction.DrillDownReport: A path to a report for the Drill-Down operation.
StiInteraction.DrillDownPage: A page for the Drill-Down operation.
StiInteraction.Bookmark: An expression to fill a component bookmark.
StiInteraction.Hyperlink: An expression to fill a component hyperlink.
StiInteraction.Tag: An expression to fill a component tag.
StiInteraction.ToolTip: An expression to fill a component ToolTip.

StiAxisInteraction.RangeScrollEnabled: A value which indicates whether the range of axis can be scrolled.

StiSeriesInteraction.AllowSeries: A value which indicates that the Drill-Down operation can be executed for Series.
StiSeriesInteraction.AllowSeriesElements: A value which indicates that the Drill-Down operation can be executed for Series Elements.
StiSeriesInteraction.DrillDownEnabled: A value that indicates whether the Drill-Down operation can be executed.
StiSeriesInteraction.DrillDownPage: A page for the Drill-Down operation.
StiSeriesInteraction.DrillDownReport: A path to a report for the Drill-Down operation.
StiSeriesInteraction.Hyperlink: An expression to fill a series hyperlink.
StiSeriesInteraction.Tag: An expression to fill a series tag.
StiSeriesInteraction.ToolTip: An expression to fill a series ToolTip.
StiSeriesInteraction.HyperlinkDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the hyperlink value.
StiSeriesInteraction.TagDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the tag value.
StiSeriesInteraction.ToolTipDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the tool tip value.
StiSeriesInteraction.ListOfHyperlinks: An expression to fill a list of hyperlinks. Example: 1;2;3
StiSeriesInteraction.ListOfTags: An expression to fill a list of tags. Example: 1;2;3
StiSeriesInteraction.ListOfToolTips: An expression to fill a list of tool tips. Example: 1;2;3

StiBandInteraction.CollapsingEnabled: A value that indicates whether it is allowed or not data collapsing in the report viewer.
StiBandInteraction.CollapseGroupFooter: A value that indicates whether it is necessary GroupFooter collapsing.
StiBandInteraction.Collapsed: A boolean expression that indicates whether a group, when rendering, should be collapsed or not.
StiBandInteraction.SelectionEnabled: A value which indicates whether it is allowed to select one data row which is output by this DataBand.

StiDrillDownParameter.Name: A name of drill-down parameter.
StiDrillDownParameter.Expression: An expression to fill the drill-down parameter.

StiBarCode.Angle: An angle of a bar-code rotation.
StiBarCode.Zoom: A value to multiply by it bar-code size.
StiBarCode.AutoScale: A value that indicates how bar-code will scale its size.
StiBarCode.ShowLabelText: A value that indicates will this bar-code show a label text or not.
StiBarCode.Code: An expression to fill a code of bar-code.
StiBarCode.GetBarCodeEvent: Occurs when getting the code of bar-code.
StiBarCode.ShowQuietZones: A value which indicates will this bar code show quiet zones or no.

StiBarCodeTypeService.Module: Width of the most fine element of the bar-code.
StiBarCodeTypeService.Ratio: A value that indicates the WideToNarrow ratio.
StiBarCodeTypeService.ShowQuietZoneIndicator: A value that indicates will show Quiet Zone Indicator or no.
StiBarCodeTypeService.AddClearZone: A value that indicates will the Clear Zone be shown.
StiBarCodeTypeService.PrintVerticalBars: A value that indicates whether to print or not vertical sections.
StiBarCodeTypeService.UseRectangularSymbols: A value that indicates will RectangularSymbols be used or not.
StiBarCodeTypeService.ErrorsCorrectionLevel: Errors correction level. The higher level is, the more information is added to bar-code for restoring.
StiBarCodeTypeService.AutoDataColumns: A value that indicates that amount of columns will be calculated automatically.
StiBarCodeTypeService.AutoDataRows: A value that indicates that amount of rows will be calculated automatically.
StiBarCodeTypeService.AspectRatio: A value that set aspect ratio between horizontal and vertical sides of bar-code.
StiBarCodeTypeService.RatioY: Vertical ratio of bar-code. Value must between 2 and 5.

StiBand.PrintOnEvenOddPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on even-odd pages.
StiBand.ResetPageNumber: Allows to reset page number on this band.
StiBand.StartNewPage: A value that indicates that it is necessary to print every new string on a new page.
StiBand.StartNewPageIfLessThan: A value that indicates how much free space on a page (in percentage terms) should be reserved for formation of a new page. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page will be formed. This property is used together with the StartNewPage property.

StiChildBand.KeepChildTogether: A value that indicates that childs are to be kept together.
StiChildBand.PrintIfParentDisabled: Gets or sets value which indicates that if the parent band is disabled then the child band will be printed anyway.

StiDataBand.KeepGroupTogether: A value that indicates that the group is to be kept together.
StiDataBand.KeepHeaderTogether: A value that indicates that the header is printed with data together.
StiDataBand.KeepFooterTogether: A value that indicates that the footer is printed with data.
StiDataBand.KeepChildTogether: A value that indicates that childs are to be kept together.
StiDataBand.KeepDetailsTogether: A value that indicates that details are to be kept together with this DataBand.
StiDataBand.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.
StiDataBand.PrintIfDetailEmpty: A value that indicates that if detail is empty then the master data must be printed anyway.
StiDataBand.EvenStyle: A value that indicates style of even lines.
StiDataBand.OddStyle: A value that indicates style of odd lines.
StiDataBand.RenderingEvent: Occurs when a data row rendering.
StiDataBand.EndRenderEvent: Occurs when band rendering is finished.
StiDataBand.GetCollapsedEvent: Occurs when the Collapsed value is calculated.
StiDataBand.MinRowsInColumn: Minimum number of rows in one column.
StiDataBand.ResetDataSource: A value that indicates to reset Data Source postion to begin when preparation for rendering.
StiDataBand.CalcInvisible: A value that indicates that, when aggregate functions calculation, it is nesessary to take into consideration invisible data bands.
StiDataBand.FilterEngine: A value which indicates how a filter will be applied to data - be means of the report generator or by means of changing the SQL query.

StiDynamicBand.PrintAtBottom: A value that indicates that the footer is printed at bottom of page.
StiDynamicBand.NewPageBefore: If the value of this property is true, then, before output of a band, a new page will be generated. Output of a band will be continued on the next page.
StiDynamicBand.NewPageAfter: If the value of this property is true, then, after output of a band, a new page will be generated.
StiDynamicBand.NewColumnBefore: A value that indicates that the footer is printed at bottom of page.
StiDynamicBand.NewColumnAfter: If the value of this property is true, then, after output of a band, a new column will be generated.
StiDynamicBand.SkipFirst: If the value of this property is true, then, a new page/column will be generated only starting from the second case.
StiDynamicBand.BreakIfLessThan: A value that indicates how much free space is on a page (in per cent) should be reserved for formation of a new page or a new column. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page or a new column will be formed. This property is used together with NewPageBefore, NewPageAfter, NewColumnBefore, NewColumnAfter properties.

StiEmptyBand.EvenStyle: A value that indicates style of even lines.
StiEmptyBand.OddStyle: A value that indicates style of odd lines.
StiEmptyBand.EndRenderEvent: Occurs when band rendering is finished.
StiEmptyBand.SizeMode: This property allows to indicate how to change the size of the last row on a page.

StiFooterBand.KeepFooterTogether: A value that indicates that the footer is printed with data.
StiFooterBand.PrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the footer if data not present.
StiFooterBand.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.

StiGroupFooterBand.KeepGroupFooterTogether: A value that indicates that the group footer is printed with data.

StiGroupHeaderBand.KeepGroupHeaderTogether: A value that indicates that group header is printed together with data.
StiGroupHeaderBand.KeepGroupTogether: A value that indicates that a group is to be kept together.
StiGroupHeaderBand.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.
StiGroupHeaderBand.GetValueEvent: Occurs when condition of the group is checked.
StiGroupHeaderBand.GetCollapsedEvent: Occurs when the Collapsed value is calculated.
StiGroupHeaderBand.BeginRenderEvent: Occurs when band begins to render.
StiGroupHeaderBand.RenderingEvent: Occurs when occurs rendering one line of data.
StiGroupHeaderBand.SummarySortDirection: Gets or sets function of calculating group totals for its sorting by totals.
StiGroupHeaderBand.SummaryType: Gets or sets the sorting direction of grouped data.
StiGroupHeaderBand.SummaryExpression: Gets or sets summary expression which is used for group summary totals calculation.
StiGroupHeaderBand.GetSummaryExpressionEvent: Occurs when when group summary expression is calculated.

StiHeaderBand.KeepHeaderTogether: A value that indicates that header is printed with data together.
StiHeaderBand.PrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the header if data not present.
StiHeaderBand.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.

StiHierarchicalBand.KeyDataColumn: A column that contains data key.
StiHierarchicalBand.MasterKeyDataColumn: A column that contains data master key.
StiHierarchicalBand.ParentValue: A column that contains parent value which identifies parent rows.
StiHierarchicalBand.Indent: Indent from the left side of band for offset of data levels.
StiHierarchicalBand.Headers: A list of headers for the hierarchical band.
StiHierarchicalBand.Footers: A list of footers for the hierarchical band.

StiReportSummaryBand.KeepReportSummaryTogether: A value that indicates that the report summary is printed with data.
StiReportSummaryBand.PrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the footer is printed at the bottom of a page.

StiReportTitleBand.PrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the report title band is printed if data is not present.

StiCrossTab.PrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the cross-tab is printed if data is not present.
StiCrossTab.KeepCrossTabTogether: A value that indicates that the CrossTab must to be kept together with DataBand on what it is placed.
StiCrossTab.EmptyValue: A string value that is used to show the cross-tab in empty cells.
StiCrossTab.Wrap: A value that indicates that the cross-tab is to be output in one column. At the same time, everything that do not fit by the width is output below. For using this property it is necessary to enable the CanBreak property of the band on which the cross-tab is placed (if it is placed on the band).
StiCrossTab.WrapGap: Space between two parts of a wrapped cross-tab. The property is used jointly with the property Wrap.

StiCrossField.MergeHeaders: A value that indicates that all equal values of header will be merged into one.
StiCrossField.GetCrossValueEvent: A script of the event GetValueEvent.
StiCrossField.Value: An expression that is used for calculation of a cell value.
StiCrossField.GetDisplayCrossValueEvent: A script of the event GetDisplayCrossValueEvent.
StiCrossField.DisplayValue: An expression that is used for calculation of a cell value which will be output in the table.
StiCrossField.ShowTotal: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to output totals or not.
StiCrossField.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.
StiCrossField.HideZeros: A value that indicates that no need show zeroes.
StiCrossField.SummaryValues: A type of zeros and nulls values summation.
StiCrossField.ShowPercents: A value that indicates that value in cell must be shown as percents.
StiCrossField.UseStyleOfSummaryInColumnTotal: A value that indicates that style of summary cell will be used in column total.
StiCrossField.UseStyleOfSummaryInRowTotal: A value that indicates that style of summary cell will be used in row total.
StiCrossField.PrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the component is printed on all pages.

StiChart.ProcessAtEnd: A value that indicates that a chart is processed at the end of the report execution.
StiChart.Rotation: A value which indicates how to rotate an chart before output.
StiChart.HorSpacing: Horizontal space between border of the chart and the chart.
StiChart.VertSpacing: Vertical space between border of the chart and the chart.
StiChart.Title: Chart title settings.
StiChart.ConstantLines: Constant lines settings of the chart.

StiChartTable.GridLineColor: A color of the grid lines.

StiChartTitle.Text: A text of the chart title.
StiChartTitle.Brush: A text brush of the chart title.
StiChartTitle.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode of chart title.
StiChartTitle.Spacing: Spacing between chart title and chart area.

StiLegend.ShowShadow: A value that indicates draw shadow or no.
StiLegend.Direction: Direction which used for series drawing in legend.
StiLegend.TitleFont: A title font of the chart legend.
StiLegend.Font: A font which used for series title drawing in chart legend.
StiLegend.MarkerBorder: A value which indicates that marker border will be shown.
StiLegend.MarkerAlignment: Alignment of markers related to series title.
StiLegend.HorSpacing: Horizontal spacing between items in legend.
StiLegend.VertSpacing: Vertical spacing between items in legend.
StiLegend.Title: A title of the legend.
StiLegend.HideSeriesWithEmptyTitle: A value which shows/hides series with empty title.

StiArea.ColorEach: A value that indicates that each series is drawn by its own colour.
StiArea.ShowShadow: A value that indicates necessary draw shadod or no.
StiArea.BorderColor: A border color of this area.
StiArea.Brush: A brush to fill a area.

StiArea.GridLinesHor: Horizontal grid lines on left axis.
StiArea.GridLinesHorRight: Horizontal grid lines on right axis.
StiArea.ReverseHor: A value that indicate that all values on horizontal axis is reverse.
StiArea.ReverseVert: A value that indicate that all values on vertical axis is reverse.

StiAxis.Step: A value that indicates with what steps do labels be shown on axis.
StiAxis.Title: Axis title settings.
StiAxis.LineColor: Line color which used to draw axis.
StiAxis.LineWidth: Line width which used to draw axis.
StiAxis.ShowEdgeValues: A value that indicates that first and last arguments on axis will be shown anyway.
StiAxis.StartFromZero: A value that indicates that all arguments will be shows from zero.
StiAxis.ShowScrollBar: A value which indicates that scroll bar will be shown.
StiAxis.RangeScrollEnabled: A value which indicates whether the range of axis can be scrolled.
StiAxis.LogarithmicScale: A value that indicates that logarithmic scale will be used.

StiAxisDateTimeStep.Step: The value indicates with what the time step values will be shown.
StiAxisDateTimeStep.NumberOfValues: The value indicates how many values to display in a time step.

StiAxisLabels.Format: Format string which is used for formating argument values.
StiAxisLabels.TextBefore: A string which will be output before argument string representation.
StiAxisLabels.TextAfter: A string which will be output after argument string representation.
StiAxisLabels.Font: a font which will be used for axis label drawing.
StiAxisLabels.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode.
StiAxisLabels.Step: A value which indicates with what steps do labels be shown on axis.
StiAxisLabels.Placement: A mode of labels placement on axis.

StiAxisRange.Auto: A value that indicates that minimum and maximum values will be calculated automatically.

StiAxisTicks.MinorCount: Count of minor ticks between two major ticks.
StiAxisTicks.Step: A value that indicates on which steps major ticks will be displayed.
StiAxisTicks.LengthUnderLabels: A length of one major tick under labels.

StiAxisTitle.Font: A font which will be used for axis title drawing.
StiAxisTitle.Color: A color which will be used for title drawing.
StiAxisTitle.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode.
StiAxisTitle.Direction: A text direction for axis title drawing.

StiConstantLines.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode.
StiConstantLines.Position: A text position at contant line.
StiConstantLines.Font: A font that is used for drawing constant line text.
StiConstantLines.Orientation: Horizontal or vertical orientation of constant line.
StiConstantLines.LineColor: A color which will be used for drawing constant line.
StiConstantLines.ShowBehind: A value that indicates that constant lines will be shown behind chart series or in front of chart series.
StiConstantLines.AxisValue: Axis value through what the constant line is drawn.

StiGridLines.Color: Color which will be used for drawing major grid lines.
StiGridLines.MinorColor: Color which will be used for drawing minor grid lines.
StiGridLines.MinorStyle: Style which will be used for drawing minor grid lines.
StiGridLines.MinorCount: Count of minor grid lines per each major grid line.

StiRadarGridLines.Color: Color which will be used for drawing major grid lines.
StiRadarGridLines.MinorColor: Color which will be used for drawing minor grid lines.
StiRadarGridLines.MinorStyle: Style which will be used for drawing minor grid lines.
StiRadarGridLines.MinorCount: Count of minor grid lines per each major grid line.

StiInterlacing.InterlacedBrush: A brush that is used for drawing interlacing bar.

StiStrips.StripBrush: A brush which will be used for drawing strips.
StiStrips.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode.
StiStrips.Orientation: Horizontal or vertical orientation of strips.
StiStrips.ShowInLegend: A value that indicates that strips will be shown in legend of chart.
StiStrips.ShowBehind: A value that indicates that strips will be shown behind chart series or in front of chart series.

StiSeries.AllowApplyBrushNegative: The values indicates that the specific brush for filling negative values will be used.
StiSeries.AllowApplyColorNegative: This value indicates that the specific color for negative values will be used.
StiSeries.ShowNulls: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to show the series element, if the value is null.
StiSeries.ShowZeros: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to show the series element, if the value is 0.
StiSeries.Format: String that is used to format series values.
StiSeries.SortBy: A mode of series values sorting.
StiSeries.ShowInLegend: A value that indicates that series must be shown in legend.
StiSeries.ShowShadow: A value that indicates draw shadow or no.
StiSeries.Filters: The filters that are used to filter series values.
StiSeries.Conditions: A collection of conditions which can be used to change behavior of series.
StiSeries.ValueDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the value.
StiSeries.AutoSeriesTitleDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the title of auto created series.
StiSeries.AutoSeriesKeyDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the key of auto created series.
StiSeries.AutoSeriesColorDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the color of auto created series. Color must be presented as string.
StiSeries.ArgumentDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the argument value.
StiSeries.YAxis: Y Axis for series on which will output string representation of arguments.
StiSeries.NewAutoSeriesEvent: Occurs when new auto series is created.
StiSeries.GetValueEvent: Occurs when getting the property Value.
StiSeries.GetListOfValuesEvent: Occurs when getting the list of values.
StiSeries.GetArgumentEvent: Occurs when getting the property Argument.
StiSeries.GetListOfArgumentsEvent: Occurs when getting the list of arguments.
StiSeries.GetTitleEvent: Occurs when getting the property Title.
StiSeries.ListOfValues: An expression to fill a list of values. Example: 1;2;3
StiSeries.ListOfArguments: An expression to fill a list of arguments. Example: 1;2;3
StiSeries.Title: A title of series.
StiSeries.Lighting: A value that indicates that light effect will be shown.
StiSeries.Brush: A brush which will used to fill series.
StiSeries.BrushNegative: A brush to fill negative values.
StiSeries.WeightDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the weight value.
StiSeries.ListOfWeights: An expression to fill a list of values. Example: 1;2;3
StiSeries.GetToolTipEvent: Occurs when getting the ToolTip for the series.
StiSeries.GetHyperlinkEvent: Occurs when getting the Hyperlink for the series.
StiSeries.GetTagEvent: Occurs when getting the Tag for a series.
StiSeries.GetWeightEvent: Occurs when getting the property Weight.
StiSeries.GetListOfWeightsEvent: Occurs when getting the list of weights.
StiSeries.GetListOfToolTipsEvent: Occurs when getting the list of tool tips.
StiSeries.GetListOfHyperlinksEvent: Occurs when getting the list of hyperlinks.
StiSeries.GetListOfTagsEvent: Occurs when getting the list of tags.
StiSeries.LineColorNegative: Line color of series for negative values.
StiSeries.PointAtCenter: A value that indicates where to place center of series segment.
StiSeries.TopmostLine: A value that indicates whether the line be displayed as a topmost.

StiAreaSeries.Brush: A brush that will be used to fill area.

StiCandlestickSeries.ListOfValuesClose: An expression to fill a list of close values. Example: 1;2;3
StiCandlestickSeries.ListOfValuesHigh: An expression to fill a list of high values. Example: 1;2;3
StiCandlestickSeries.ListOfValuesLow: An expression to fill a list of low values. Example: 1;2;3
StiCandlestickSeries.ListOfValuesOpen: An expression to fill a list of open values. Example: 1;2;3
StiCandlestickSeries.ValueDataColumnClose: A column name column that contains the close value.
StiCandlestickSeries.ValueDataColumnHigh: A column name that contains the high value.
StiCandlestickSeries.ValueDataColumnLow: A column name that contains the low value.
StiCandlestickSeries.ValueDataColumnOpen: A column name that contains the open value.

StiClusteredColumnSeries.Width: Width factor of one bar series. Value 1 is equal to 100%.

StiGanttSeries.ValueDataColumn: A name of the column that contains the start value.
StiGanttSeries.ValueDataColumnEnd: A name of the column that contains the end value.
StiGanttSeries.ListOfValues: An expression to fill a list of start values. Example: 1;2;3
StiGanttSeries.ListOfValuesEnd: An expression to fill a list of end values. Example: 1;2;3
StiGanttSeries.GetValueEndEvent: Occurs when getting the property Value.
StiGanttSeries.GetListOfValuesEndEvent: Occurs when getting the list of end values.

StiMarker.ShowInLegend: A value that indicates that marker will be visible in legend marker.
StiMarker.Brush: A brush that will be used to fill marker area.
StiMarker.Angle: A rotation angle of the marker.

StiPieSeries.AllowApplyBrush: A value that allows using a brush from series settings.
StiPieSeries.AllowApplyBorderColor: A value that allow to use border color from series settings.
StiPieSeries.Diameter: Fixed size of diameter of pie series.
StiPieSeries.Distance: Distance between the center of series and the center of each segment.
StiPieSeries.CutPieList: An expression to fill a list of cut pie segments. Example: 1;4;6
StiPieSeries.GetCutPieListEvent: Occurs when getting the cut pie list.

StiDoughnutSeries.Diameter: Fixed size of diameter of doughnut series.

StiSeriesLabels.Conditions: A collection of conditions which can be used to change behavior of series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.ShowNulls: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to show the series label, if the value is null.
StiSeriesLabels.ShowZeros: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to show the series label, if the value is 0.
StiSeriesLabels.MarkerAlignment: Marker alignment related to the label text.
StiSeriesLabels.Step: A value that indicates with what steps will labels be shown.
StiSeriesLabels.ValueType: What type of information will be shown in series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.ValueTypeSeparator: A string that contain separator for value information (if applicated).
StiSeriesLabels.LegendValueType: What type of information will be shown in the legend.
StiSeriesLabels.TextBefore: A text that will be shown before label text.
StiSeriesLabels.TextAfter: A text that will be shown after label text.
StiSeriesLabels.Format: Format string that is used for formating series values (if applicable).
StiSeriesLabels.Antialiasing: A value that control antialiasing drawing mode of a chart title.
StiSeriesLabels.DrawBorder: A value that incates that border will be drawn or not.
StiSeriesLabels.UseSeriesColor: A value that indicates that series colors must be used.
StiSeriesLabels.LabelColor: A foreground color of series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.BorderColor: A border color of series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.Brush: A brush that will be used to fill area of series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.Font: A font that will be used to draw series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.PreventIntersection: A value that indicates that whether it is necessary to avoid intersections between border of series labels and border of series.
StiSeriesLabels.AutoRotate: A value that enables or disables auto rotate mode drawing of series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.LineLength: Length of line between border of series labels and border of series element.
StiSeriesLabels.ShowValue: A value that indicates that values from series will be shown in series labels.
StiSeriesLabels.ShowInPercent: A value that indicates that values from series must be shown as percents.

StiSeriesTopN.ShowOther: The value sets whether to display different values.

StiTrendLine.LineColor: A color which will be used for drawing trend line.
StiTrendLine.ShowShadow: A value that indicates draw shadow or no.

StiRadarAxisLabels.DrawBorder: A value which indicates that label border will be shown.
StiRadarAxisLabels.Brush: A brush which will used to fill label area.

StiOutsidePieLabels.LineLength: A line length between border of series labels and border of pie series.

StiReportControl.MouseLeaveEvent: A script of the MouseLeave event.

StiReportControl.GetToolTipEvent: A script of the GetToolTip event.

StiReportControl.RightToLeft: A value indicates whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.

StiForm.ClickEvent: A script of the Click event.

StiForm.RightToLeft: A value indicates whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
StiForm.Text: A text associated with this control.
StiForm.BackColor: A background color for the control.

StiForm.StartMode: A value that indicates time when form appears.
StiForm.Visible: A value indicates whether the control is displayed.

StiButtonControl.Image: An image that is displayed on a button control.
StiButtonControl.Default: A value that indicates which button is clicked when the user hits the ENTER key.

StiButtonControl.Cancel: A value that indicates which button is clicked when the user presses the ESCAPE key.

StiButtonControl.TextAlign: An alignment of the text on the button control.

StiCheckBoxControl.Text: A text associated with this control.

StiCheckedListBoxControl.SelectedIndexChangedEvent: Occurs when the SelectedIndex property has been changed.
StiCheckedListBoxControl.ItemsBinding: A data bindings for the items.
StiCheckedListBoxControl.SelectedItemBinding: Data bindings for the selected item.
StiCheckedListBoxControl.SelectedValueBinding: Data bindings for the selected value.

StiCheckedListBoxControl.Sorted: A value indicates whether the items in the ListBox are sorted alphabetically.

StiComboBoxControl.Items: An object representing the collection of the items.
StiComboBoxControl.DropDownWidth: Width of the of the drop-down portion.
StiComboBoxControl.Sorted: A value indicates whether the items are sorted.

StiDateTimePickerControl.ValueChangedEvent: A script of the event ValueChanged.
StiDateTimePickerControl.MaxDateBinding: Data bindings for the max date.
StiDateTimePickerControl.MinDateBinding: Data bindings for the min date.
StiDateTimePickerControl.Format: A format of the date and time displayed in the control.
StiDateTimePickerControl.DropDownAlign: An alignment of the drop-down calendar on the date-time picker control.
StiDateTimePickerControl.ShowUpDown: A value indicates whether an up-down control is used to adjust the date-time value.
StiDateTimePickerControl.Today: A value that indicates the date is set equal current date.
StiDateTimePickerControl.MaxDate: Maximum date and time that can be selected in the control.
StiDateTimePickerControl.MinDate: Minimum date and time that can be selected in the control.
StiDateTimePickerControl.Value: A date-time value assigned to the control.

StiGridControl.ForeColor: A foreground color (typically the color of the text) property.
StiGridControl.BackColor: A background color of the grid.
StiGridControl.AlternatingBackColor: A background color of alternating rows for a ledger appearance.

StiGridControl.HeaderFont: A font used for column headers.
StiGridControl.ColumnHeadersVisible: A value indicates whether the column headers a table are visible.
StiGridControl.RowHeadersVisible: A value that specifies whether row headers are visible.
StiGridControl.GridLineStyle: A line style of the grid.
StiGridControl.PreferredColumnWidth: Default width of the grid columns in pixels.
StiGridControl.PositionChangedEvent: A script of the event PositionChanged.

StiGroupBoxControl.Text: A text associated with this control.

StiLabelControl.Text: A text associated with this control.
StiLabelControl.TextAlign: An alignment of text in the label.

StiListBoxControl.SelectedIndexChangedEvent: A script of the event SelectedIndexChanged.
StiListBoxControl.SelectedItemBinding: Data bindings for the selected item.
StiListBoxControl.SelectedValueBinding: Data bindings for the selected value.
StiListBoxControl.SelectedIndexBinding: Data bindings for the selected index.
StiListBoxControl.ItemHeight: Height of an item in the ListBox.
StiListBoxControl.SelectionMode: A method in what items are selected in the ListBox.
StiListBoxControl.Sorted: A value indicates whether the items in the ListBox are sorted alphabetically.

StiListViewControl.SelectedIndexChangedEvent: Occurs when the SelectedIndex property has changed.

StiLookUpBoxControl.Keys: An object representing the collection of the keys.
StiLookUpBoxControl.SelectedKeyBinding: Data bindings for the selected key.

StiNumericUpDownControl.Minimum: Minimum allowed value for the up-down control.
StiNumericUpDownControl.Maximum: Maximum value for the up-down control.
