StiNumericUpDownControl.Value: A value assigned to the up-down control.
StiNumericUpDownControl.ValueChangedEvent: A script of the event ValueChanged.

StiPanelControl.BorderStyle: Indicates the border style for the control.

StiPictureBoxControl.SizeMode: Indicates how the image is displayed.
StiPictureBoxControl.TransparentColor: A transparent color for the image.
StiPictureBoxControl.BorderStyle: Indicates the border style for the control.
StiPictureBoxControl.Image: An image that the PictureBox displays.

StiRadioButtonControl.Checked: A value indicates whether the control is checked.
StiRadioButtonControl.Text: A text associated with this control.

StiRichTextBoxControl.Text: A current text in the rich text box.

StiTextBoxControl.Multiline: A value indicates whether this is a multiline text box control.
StiTextBoxControl.WordWrap: Indicates whether a multiline text box control automatically wraps words to the beginning of the next line when necessary.
StiTextBoxControl.AcceptsTab: A value indicates whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.
StiTextBoxControl.AcceptsReturn: A value indicates whether pressing ENTER in a multiline TextBox control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
StiTextBoxControl.MaxLength: Maximum number of characters the user can type into the text box control.
StiTextBoxControl.PasswordChar: A character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line TextBox control.
StiTextBoxControl.Text: A current text in the text box.

StiTreeViewControl.AfterSelectEvent: Occurs when the AfterSelect property has changed.

StiGridColumn.DataTextField: A name of data column to be shown.
StiGridColumn.NullText: A text that will be shown instead null values.

StiReport.BeginRenderEvent: Occurs when the report rendering starts.
StiReport.RenderingEvent: Occurs when a page is rendered.
StiReport.EndRenderEvent: Occurs when the report rendering is finished.
StiReport.CalculationMode: A method of an expression calculation in the report rendering.
StiReport.Styles: A collection which consists of styles.
StiReport.ParametersOrientation: A value which indicates parameters panel orientation.
StiReport.NumberOfPass: Number of passes which the report generator makes while report rendering.
StiReport.ReportUnit: The current unit of the report.
StiReport.CacheAllData: A value that indicates whether it is necessary to cache all data of the report in one DataSet.
StiReport.ReportCacheMode: A value that indicates how the report engine uses the report cache.
StiReport.ConvertNulls: A value that shows whether it is necessary to convert null or DBNull.
StiReport.StoreImagesInResources: A value that indicates that images from report will be stored as assembly resources.
StiReport.PreviewMode: The preview mode of a report.
StiReport.StopBeforePage: A page number. When this page is reached then the report rendering is stopped.
StiReport.PreviewSettings: Controls which will be shown in the Preview Window.
StiReport.Collate: A value that can be used for pages collating. The value of the property cannot be less then 1.
StiReport.GlobalizationStrings: A collection which consists of globalization strings.
StiReport.AutoLocalizeReportOnRun: A property that allows automatic localization of the report when running starts.
StiReport.RequestParameters: Gets or sets value which indicates whether to request parameters from a user before report rendering or render a report with the default value of parameters.

StiPrinterSettings.Copies: A number of copies of a report for printing.
StiPrinterSettings.Collate: A value that indicates that collate mode of printing will be used or not.
StiPrinterSettings.ShowDialog: A value that indicates that print dialog will be shown or not.
StiPrinterSettings.PrinterName: A name of printer which will be used for report printing.

StiTable.AutoWidth: Which range use table component for adjusting columns width.
StiTable.DockableTable: A value which indicates that the table will be adjusted to the top of the parent component area.
StiTable.AutoWidthType: How to adjust columns width to the table component.
StiTable.RowCount: A number of rows in the table.
StiTable.ColumnCount: A number of columns in the table.
StiTable.FooterRowsCount: A number of footer rows in the table.
StiTable.HeaderRowsCount: A number of header rows in the table.
StiTable.HeaderPrintOn: A value that indicates how header of table will be print on pages.
StiTable.HeaderCanGrow: A value that indicates that header of table can grow its height.
StiTable.HeaderCanShrink: A value that indicates that this header can shrink its height.
StiTable.HeaderCanBreak: A value that indicates that this header can break its content.
StiTable.HeaderPrintAtBottom: A value that indicates that the header of a table will be printed at the bottom of a page.
StiTable.HeaderPrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the header will be print if data is not present in table.
StiTable.HeaderPrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the header of a table will be printed on all pages.
StiTable.HeaderPrintOnEvenOddPages: A value that indicates how the header of a table will be printed on even-odd pages.
StiTable.FooterPrintOn: A value that indicates how the footer of a table will be printed on the pages.
StiTable.FooterCanGrow: A value that indicates that the footer of a table can grow its height.
StiTable.FooterCanShrink: A value that indicates that this footer can shrink its height.
StiTable.FooterCanBreak: A value that indicates that this footer can break its content.
StiTable.FooterPrintAtBottom: A value that indicates that the footer of a table will be printed at the bottom of page.
StiTable.FooterPrintIfEmpty: A value that indicates that the footer will be printed if data not present in table.
StiTable.FooterPrintOnAllPages: A value that indicates that the footer of a table will be printed on all pages.
StiTable.FooterPrintOnEvenOddPages: A value that indicates how the footer of a table will be printed on even-odd pages.

StiDatabase.ConnectingEvent: Occurs when connection is being activated.
StiDatabase.DisconnectingEvent: Occurs when connection is being deactivated.
StiDatabase.Name: A name of the database.
StiDatabase.PathSchema: A path to the XML schema.
StiDatabase.PathData: A path to the XML data.
StiDatabase.ConnectionString: A connection string which contains SQL connection parameters.
StiDatabase.PromptUserNameAndPassword: A value which indicates that UserName and Password parameters should be requested from user.

StiBusinessObject.Name: A name of the business object.
StiBusinessObject.Alias: An alias of the business object.
StiBusinessObject.Category: A category name of the business object.
StiBusinessObject.Columns: A column collection of the business object.

StiDataSource.Name: A Data Source name which will be used in report.
StiDataSource.ConnectOnStart: A value that indicates that datasource is not connected to the data automatically.
StiDataSource.ConnectionOrder: A value that indicates in what order that datasource will be connect to the data.
StiDataSource.ReconnectOnEachRow: A value which indicates that datasource reconnect on each master row in master-detail reports.
StiDataSource.CommandTimeout: A number of seconds to wait while attempting to execute a command, before canceling the attempt and generate an error. Default is 30.
StiDataSource.AllowExpressions: A value which indicates that sql query of the datasource can contain script expressions or no.
StiDataSource.NameInSource: A name of the Data Source in database.
StiDataSource.SqlCommand: A SQL statement to execute at the Data Source.
StiDataSource.Parameters: The parameter collection of the SQL query.
StiDataSource.Type: A value which indicates type of sql datasource.
StiDataSource.Path: A path to the data file.

StiDataColumn.Name: A column name which will be used in report.
StiDataColumn.NameInSource: A column original name in database.
StiDataColumn.Expression: An expression of the calculated column.

StiDataParameter.Name: A name of the data parameter.
StiDataParameter.Alias: An alias of the data parameter.
StiDataParameter.Type: A type of the data parameter.
StiDataParameter.Expression: An expression of the calculated column.

StiDataRelation.Name: A relation name which will be used in report.
StiDataRelation.ChildColumns: A collection of child column names.
StiDataRelation.ParentColumns: A collection of parent column names.
StiDataRelation.NameInSource: A name of relation in database.

Universal.AllowApplyStyle: A value that indicates that chart style will be used.
Universal.Value: A Value which will be displayed instead of the Key value in GUI.
Universal.Key: A Key which will be used in variables when user select associated with it Value in GUI.

StiBaseStyle.CollectionName: A name of the styles collection.
StiBaseStyle.Conditions: A collection of the style conditions.
StiBaseStyle.Name: A style name.
StiBaseStyle.HorAlignment: A horizontal alignment of the style.
StiBaseStyle.VertAlignment: A vertical alignment of the style.
StiBaseStyle.Font: A font for drawing this style.
StiBaseStyle.ForeColor: A foreground color for drawing this style.
StiBaseStyle.BackColor: A background color for drawing this style.
StiBaseStyle.Brush: A brush to fill the style.
StiBaseStyle.TextBrush: A brush to draw the text.
StiBaseStyle.BrushType: A value which indicates which type of brush will be used to draw this style.
StiBaseStyle.StyleColors: A list of colors which will be used for drawing chart series.
StiBaseStyle.BasicStyleColor: A base color for drawing this style.
StiBaseStyle.Image: An image to fill the Image property of the Image component.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseBackColor: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use BackColor for dialog controls.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseForeColor: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use ForeColor for dialog controls.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseHorAlignment: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use HorAlignment formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseVertAlignment: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use VertAlignment formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseImage: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use Image formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseFont: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use Font formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseBorderFormatting: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use Border formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseBorderSides: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use Border Sides or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseBorderSidesFromLocation: A value which indicates whether a report engine can set border sides of a component depending on the component location.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseBrush: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use Brush formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseTextBrush: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use TextBrush formatting or not.
StiBaseStyle.AllowUseTextOptions: A value which indicates whether a report engine can use TextOptions formatting or not.
